name: Jordas Golem Assassinate
description: Access this assassination mission by completing the Jordas Precept quest.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Jordas Golem Assassinate mission reward being lowercase.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the level ranges displayed on navigation for the Jordas Golem Assassinate, Jordas Verdict, Law of Retribution, and Mutalist Alad V Assassinate.

name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the level ranges displayed on navigation for the Jordas Golem Assassinate, Jordas Verdict, Law of Retribution, and Mutalist Alad V Assassinate.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Mutalist Alad V Assassinate Key displaying an incorrect description in the Foundry.

name: Apostasy Prologue
description: Inspect your personal quarters upon finishing the Chains of Harrow quest.

name: The Archwing
description: The Balor Fomorians are coming but we are ready. Through your efforts we finally have a working Archwing prototype and I am sending you the blueprint. However, your task is not yet complete. You still must discover the component parts.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed invisible Archwing during the initial The Archwing quest cinematic.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Archwing Launcher Segment not being Chat linkable.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not receiving Cache rewards in the Archwing Quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed getting stuck in the Archwing Revive animation when attempting to revive someone.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Excavators not spawning during The Archwing quest.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.9.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed The Archwing extraction during the Balor Formorian phase not initiating when playing in a squad as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/713614-the-archwing-quest-during-balor-fomorian-part-is-impossible-to-finish-if-done-in-a-squad/

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing objective HUD marker for the Defense Portion of the Archwing Pursuit Mission.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U2.1 + U2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a loss of functionality when selecting the Archwing Arsenal as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/699948-softlock-when-selecting-archwing-in-arsenal-100-replication/

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed appearing reversed when selecting the Archwing mode in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with The Archwing Quest not being completable for players, specifically players being unable to start the Balor Fomorian mission..

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the Archwing Mastery Rank test to reflect recent Archwing movement changes.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed ground enemies continually spawning after you have been teleported to Archwing in the Archwing Quest Fomorian Escape mission. This caused significant performance drops.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed experience earned in Archwing becoming shared with the Warframe equipped, and not just the Archwing and Archwing weapons.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a hole in the terrain on the Archwing underwater drop point in the Grineer Underwater Sealab tileset on Uranus.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopper issue with the Archwing Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Archwing’s Affinity bar disappearing due to the equipped Warframe being at max level.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed enemies not being so perceptive in the Archwing portions of the Grineer Underwater Lab tileset.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue caused by building the Odonata while the Archwing Quest is still inactive, causing an error when activating the quest in the World State Window.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mesa’s Regulator pistols not being holstered when viewed in the Archwing Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue that would cause a failure to load the final Mission of the Archwing Quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed  appearing in the place of the Archwing icon on items rewarded at the End of Mission screen.

name: Octavia'S Anthem
description: Build the Mandachord and find the cause of Cephalon Suda’s erratic behavior.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Hydraulus being invisible in some missions during Octavia's Anthem quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a variety of random crashes that occurred most frequently at the end of the Octavia's Anthem Quest but would have caused pain and suffering throughout the game.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue being unable to progress in the Octavia's Anthem quest - it would appear as though the Hydraulus was inert and you couldn't interact with any objects. This has been fixed.

name: The New Strange
description: Work with Cephalon Simaris to find the source of a mysterious voice.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a hitch in the final mission of The New Strange quest.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Synthesis Targets sometimes not spawning in The New Strange Quest due to a broken path in one of the procedural levels.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the “Scan 3 Elite Arid Lancers on Mars” node of the New Strange Quest leading to any event/Syndicate/Fissure mission on the node instead of a regular mission.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.1 + 19.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed automatic Quest progression in The New Strange

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping bug in The New Strange quest if the Chroma Chassis was received but never built before Specters of The Rail released.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with the incorrect type of doors being visible during The New Strange quest.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 12
patchlogs.changes: Fixed not being able to progress through The New Strange quest as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/676594-unable-to-progress-in-the-new-strange/

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to progress through The New Strange due to having partially completed the quest before the Specters of the Rail update.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed desert enemies spawning instead of shipyards enemies in the New Strange quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue preventing players from accepting the Quest: The New Strange.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Chroma not appearing in the final portion of the New Strange Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.8.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a typo in ‘The New Strange’ Quest dialogue.

name: The Silver Grove
description: New Loka seeks help protecting a sacred forest from Grineer incursions, but are they ready to face the forest’s true nature?

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a hitch in the third mission of the Silver Grove quest when the enemy spawns.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed not being able to extract in the last mission of The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Silver Grove shrine teleporting out of the Defense area during the final quest mission, making it vulnerable and unable to be protected.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with starting The Silver Grove quest from the World State Window.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U2.1 + U2.2
patchlogs.changes: Slowed down Synoid Helicors spinning animation.The Silver Grove: U2.2:

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 5
patchlogs.changes: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 5:

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U3 Ayatan
patchlogs.changes: The Silver Grove: U3 Ayatan:

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed flowing water issues in The Silver Grove Shrine tileset.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed being able to collide with the Shrine in The Silver Grove quest.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.changes: The Lotus will now inform you of your location to the Shrine when finding it outside of The Silver Grove quest.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed no VO playing when nearing the Shrine in The Silver Grove quest.

name: A Man Of Few Words
description: Darvo needs your help again. Save one of his best contractors from Grineer execution.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the A Man of Few Words Quest not appearing in the Codex when completed.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players seeing no subtitles at the end of the A Man of Few Words Quest when talking to Darvo.

name: Saya'S Vigil
description: On the Plains of Eidolon a mystery has lain buried for years: one that will mend or destroy a heart, and open the door to a hidden past.

name: The Jordas Precept
description: Ordis is determined to help a fellow Cephalon overcome a ship wide infestation.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed further issues with people unable to access the Jordas Precept quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a typo in the The Jordas Precept Quest as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/538745-de-please/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a typo in the Jordas Precept Quest as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/538745-de-please-typo-in-quest/

name: The Glast Gambit
description: Nef Anyo has stolen the children of the Mycona Colony and it is up to you to get them back. You must challenge Nef on The Index and beat him at his own game. But Tenno, beware, not all is as it seems.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.11.0+19.11.0.1
patchlogs.changes: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.0.1:

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Sonicor not causing knock down in Conclave.The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1.1:

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.changes: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3:

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.1 + 19.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed The Glast Gambit not properly registering alignment choice

name: Patient Zero
description: Find Alad V’s laboratory and put a stop to his madness

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Players who have the blueprints for The Limbo Theorem, Hidden Messages, or Patient Zero will now automatically receive the quest itself upon logging in. The blueprints will be removed and if they were under construction, the resources and credits will be refunded (except for the argon crystals for The Limbo Theorem, sorry!).

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Patient Zero quest Mesa Specter holding a random purple object.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nightmare missions appearing on quest nodes (e.g. Mutalist Alad V Assassination from Patient Zero quest).

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a typo in the Patient Zero Quest line.

name: Once Awake
description: Intercepted Grineer communications reveal that Grineer have been experimenting with some sort of bio weapon. You must investigate.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fix a progression stopping issue in the Once Awake quest if the player switched their active quest before claiming the Heat Sword Blueprint, and then built and sold the Heat Sword before ever switching Once Awake back to being an active quest.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an Infested object blocking the door near the end of the Once Awake quest.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players not receiving their reward for completing the Once Awake quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed redundant End Mission transmission that plays at the completion of the Once Awake quest.

name: Howl Of The Kubrow
description: You are Tenno, you deserve a Kubrow by your side.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping issue in the Howl of the Kubrow quest if you died and revived in the mission.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Changed the Howl of the Kubrow quest phase description from "Wait for your Kubrow to mature" to "Incubate and mature a Kubrow using the Incubator" as Maturing is now done manually by players.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with Howl of the Kubrow quest being prematurely completable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Kubrow’s collar not being hidden during the last Mission in the Howl of the Kubrow Quest.

name: The Limbo Theorem
description:
The Limbo Theorem quest cannot be completed without an Archwing
Piece together the Limbo Theorem to uncover its source

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Players who have the blueprints for The Limbo Theorem, Hidden Messages, or Patient Zero will now automatically receive the quest itself upon logging in. The blueprints will be removed and if they were under construction, the resources and credits will be refunded (except for the argon crystals for The Limbo Theorem, sorry!).

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to progress in the Limbo Theorem quest due to the wrong mission type being used (Exterminate vs. proper Excavation).

name: Hidden Messages
description: Seek out the Warframe Mirage

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Players who have the blueprints for The Limbo Theorem, Hidden Messages, or Patient Zero will now automatically receive the quest itself upon logging in. The blueprints will be removed and if they were under construction, the resources and credits will be refunded (except for the argon crystals for The Limbo Theorem, sorry!).

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed one of the Hidden Messages quest node being labeled "Solve the Riddle from the Inbox Message", which defeats the purpose of the riddle.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed VO not properly triggering in the Hidden Messages Quest.

name: Sands Of Inaros
description: Help Baro Ki'Teer raid an ancient Martian tomb for a mysterious treasure.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed transmissions in certain quests being stuck on repeat (eg: Sands of Inaros).

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sands of Inaros quest description having the wrong tomb location text.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 12
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Sands of Inaros quest countdown timer displaying the incorrect location.

name: The Second Dream
description: The Sentient Hunhow seeks to destroy the Tenno by exploiting long forgotten secrets.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed minor performance issue and crashing during the ‘Protect the Moon’ phase of The Second Dream.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Baro's offerings will no longer show Operator items if you have not completed the Second Dream quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed mission objective waypoint marker not disappearing after completing the objective in the Second Dream.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Dreams: Hotfix 2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed needing to relog to replay the Second Dream quest more than once.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Removed Lotus’ “Job well done” VO at the end of the Second Dream missions.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.6+19.5.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an unintentional locked door in the Second Dream quest.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 3 (Nekros Prime!)
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where it was impossible to complete the Second Dream using only the Steam Controller.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Operator’s not having visible fingers and toes in The Second Dream diorama.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Second Dream quest key being given as a reward from completing the Natah quest. Players must complete the Uranus to Neptune Junction as intended.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing Clients to end up with 50 base Armor after completing The Second Dream.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed auto-parry Mods causing the Warframe to parry while holding the Operator during the final stage of the Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Updated various audio FX that occur during the Second Dream’s cinematics.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies not spawning with the correct level in the last Mission of The Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Hunhow’s essence in War not having a proper lighting FX in the Second Dream cinematic.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Greater Lens Blueprints will no longer appear in the Market for players who have not completed The Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ivara’s Artemis Bow HUD appearing while Ivara is carrying the Operator in the Second Dream Quest.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing the first Mission in the Second Dream Quest to not properly extract the player on Mission failure.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed various issues related to the Second Dream Quest (no spoilers).
patchlogs.additions: Players can now rewatch the Stalker Intro Cinematic from The Second Dream Quest via the ‘Rewatch’ button available in the Quest’s Codex.

name: Chains Of Harrow
description: A strange transmission leads deep into the dark world of Red Veil mysticism. What evils will be found there and what do they want?

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Added controller support to parts of the Chains of Harrow quest.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed certain effects in the Chains of Harrow quest showing up prematurely.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to destroy the chains in the Chains of Harrow quest, or the braids in the War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to invite players to Iron Wake before they have progressed in Chains of Harrow.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an incorrectly placed teleporter in the Earth Forest tileset.Chains Of Harrow: Hotfix 21.2.0.1:

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed quest VO initiating too early during Chains of Harrow quest (vague for spoiler reasons).

name: Natah
description: Strange drones have appeared in the Origin System, help the Lotus find out what they are and who sent them.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Second Dream quest key being given as a reward from completing the Natah quest. Players must complete the Uranus to Neptune Junction as intended.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error preventing players for receiving their inbox reward for completing the Natah Quest.  Accounts that did not properly receive their reward have been reimbursed with this hotfix.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Natah Quest not being flagged as completed even after the player receives their reward.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Grineer spawning inside the wall during the the Defense mission in the Natah Quest.

name: Stolen Dreams
description: Find the thief Maroo and uncover the secrets of the Arcane Codices.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping issue in the Stolen Dreams where you were unable to ‘Find the Arcane Machine’.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the dialogue between Lotus and Maroo at the final mission of Stolen Dreams being out of order.

name: Vor'S Prize
description:
MY QUEENS -
You were right, the Tenno threat is real. We found one drifting near Pluto but the Lotus knew we were coming. She purged the Cryo moments before we had them and sent a squad of Tenno to break our assault.
They escaped. We are working on tracing them. Separate this Tenno from the flock and it should be easy to kill. We shattered its Warframe and expect such an abrupt Cryo purge will have damaged its memories.
We anxiously await punishment for failing this task.
- VOR

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed new players seeing the incorrect number of Revives remaining before completing Vor's Prize.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies spawning in view of players in the Ground Zero mission of Vor's Prize.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed having to relog between stages in Vor's Prize.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed long-term players who chose to skip Vor's Prize not being able to see in-game news or events in the Navigation console.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Dreams: Hotfix 3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed forced solo Quest missions not giving out proper Quest rewards (Mission 1 of Vor's Prize & mission 3 of Kubrow Quest). This should help a handful of players who cannot progress through their Quests.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed electric sounds not turning off when electrified water is disabled in Vor's Prize.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked location of Mariana - Earth node so the Vor's Prize mission text doesn't overlap the next node's text.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issues with not being able to progress in Vor's Prize by ensuring players are rewarded proper resources at end of mission

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue preventing players from crafting blueprints in the Tutorial Quest 'Vor's Prize'.

name: The War Within
description: A disturbance in the Somatic Link prompts the Lotus to send operatives back to the Tenno Reservoir.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a progression stopping crash in The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a grammatical error in Teshin’s Inbox message after completing The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a stuck waypoint in the final mission of The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed bug with Sabotage and Assault missions with “Defend the Object” in the Kuva Fortress that caused progress stoppers in The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Synthesis Targets spawning in The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed not being able to damage the Grineer Queen for a few seconds until she quits her yappin’ in The War Within quest. The War Within speedrunners rejoice for precious seconds are SAVED!!

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Operator getting stuck in an idle animation after returning to the Landing Craft during The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to use Transference in first mission of The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Operator getting stuck in a t-pose after Void Dashing in The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a lighting issue in the The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to destroy the chains in the Chains of Harrow quest, or the braids in the War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an invisible wall causing a progression stopper in the War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to fly into one of the sections that you're supposed to walk in during The War Within.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed animation on a specific set of doors within The War Within Quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Operator having two sceptres at the end of The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a mini Excalibur mesh showing over top of the Operator in The War Within missions.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash during The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed getting stuck as a burrowed Maw during The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes: Fixed occasional hitches in the The War Within quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed HUD elements popping up during certain The War Within cinematics.
